message.content: Your text seems to be a mix of different things - an introduction, a discussion of the pros and cons of school uniforms, and a conclusion - but it lacks clear signposting to indicate these different sections. You may want to focus on organizing your ideas into clear paragraphs with a single main idea each. Additionally, there are some spelling and grammatical errors that need to be corrected. Overall, your writing falls somewhere in the middle of the range between a low and a medium score, but with some revision and editing, you can improve your writing and achieve a higher score.
